content.body:
hi, I am trying to find out where Window's associated document needs to be set/updated. So far I found that specification defines "11. Set window's associated Document to document." in https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/document-lifecycle.html#initialise-the-document-object

is that actually the only place where associated document should be set? shouldn't it also be set for document created alongside the browsing context here https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/document-sequences.html#creating-a-new-browsing-context ?
